content.rendered: I often take photos at Under the Influence, an inspired monthly acoustic night held at the Boogaloo in Highgate. Each act plays two of their own songs and one cover of the month’s featured artist. Last month this was the late, much underrated, Terry Callier. Next up is Suede, on 18 March.
